type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Modify FoV

---


[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_fov).

Changes the FoV of a player on their client.

Type ID: `apugli:modify_fov`

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "apugli:modify_fov",
    "modifier": {
      "operation": "multiply_base_multiplicative",
      "value": 0.025,
      "modifier": {
        "name": "Additional FOV from stored resource",
        "operation": "multiply_total_multiplicative",
        "value": 0.0,
        "resource": "example:resource"
      }
    },
    "change_divisor": 8
}
```
This example will change the FoV by `0.025` * `example:resource`'s value, with a change divisor of `8`.

### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Modify FoV

---


[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_fov).

### Example
```json

    "change_divisor": 8

```
This example will change the FoV by `0.025` * `example:resource`'s value, with a change divisor of `8`.

modifier.description: If set, this modifier will apply to any time that an item meets the item condition's has a change in durability.
modifier.markdownDescription: If set, this modifier will apply to any time that an item meets the item condition's has a change in durability.

modifiers.description: If set, these modifiers will apply to any time that an item meets the item condition's has a change in durability.
modifiers.markdownDescription: If set, these modifiers will apply to any time that an item meets the item condition's has a change in durability.

change_divisor.description: The divisor at which the FoV will smooth into the next value. A higher value will make it slower.
change_divisor.markdownDescription: The divisor at which the FoV will smooth into the next value. A higher value will make it slower.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Modify FoV Change (Power Type) date: 2022-11-08

Modify FoV

Power Type.

Changes the FoV of a player on their client.

Type ID: apugli:modify_fov

Fields

Field Type Default Description
modifier Attribute Modifier optional If set, this modifier will apply to any time that an item meets the item condition's has a change in durability.
modifiers Array of Attribute Modifiers optional If set, these modifiers will apply to any time that an item meets the item condition's has a change in durability.
change_divisor Float 1.0 The divisor at which the FoV will smooth into the next value. A higher value will make it slower.

Example

{
    "type": "apugli:modify_fov",
    "modifier": {
      "operation": "multiply_base_multiplicative",
      "value": 0.025,
      "modifier": {
        "name": "Additional FOV from stored resource",
        "operation": "multiply_total_multiplicative",
        "value": 0.0,
        "resource": "example:resource"
      }
    },
    "change_divisor": 8
}

This example will change the FoV by 0.025 * example:resource's value, with a change divisor of 8.
